public void capeEmote() { if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7648) { //attack stillgfx(346, absY, absX); stillgfx(427, absY, absX); stillgfx(83, absY, absX); txt4 = "An attack skill cape."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7636) { //strength stillgfx(482, absY, absX); stillgfx(481, absY, absX); stillgfx(246, absY, absX); txt4 = "A strength skill cape."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7650) { //defence stillgfx(222, absY, absX); stillgfx(144, absY, absX); stillgfx(391, absY, absX); txt4 = "A defence skill cape."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7623) { //hitpoints stillgfx(444, absY, absX); stillgfx(574, absY, absX); stillgfx(199, absY, absX); txt4 = "A hitpoints skill cape."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7628) { //ranging stillgfx(472, absY, absX); stillgfx(474, absY, absX); stillgfx(20, absY, absX); stillgfx(21, absY, absX); stillgfx(22, absY, absX); stillgfx(23, absY, absX); stillgfx(24, absY, absX); stillgfx(25, absY, absX); stillgfx(26, absY, absX); txt4 = "A ranging skill cape."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7640) { //prayer stillgfx(84, absY, absX); stillgfx(263, absY, absX); stillgfx(264, absY, absX); stillgfx(426, absY, absX); txt4 = "A prayer skill cape."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7627) { //magic stillgfx(409, absY, absX); stillgfx(498, absY, absX); stillgfx(497, absY, absX); txt4 = "A magic skill cape."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7632) { //cooking stillgfx(563, absY +1, absX); setAnimation(883); txt4 = "A cooking skill cape."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7672) { //wood stillgfx(187, absY, absX); txt4 = "A woodcutting skill cape."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7678) { //fletch stillgfx(588, absY, absX); txt4 = "A fletching skill cape."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7630) { //fish pEmote = 0x2575; stillgfx(68, absY, absX); txt4 = "A fishing skill cape."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7685) { //firemaking stillgfx(453, absY, absX); stillgfx(446, absY, absX); txt4 = "A firemaking skill cape."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7682) { //crafting stillgfx(239, absY, absX); txt4 = "A crafting skill cape."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7680) { //smithing stillgfx(436, absY, absX); txt4 = "A smithing skill cape."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7657) { //mining stillgfx(287, absY, absX); txt4 = "A mining skill cape."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7638) { //herblore stillgfx(267, absY, absX); stillgfx(255, absY, absX); stillgfx(259, absY, absX); stillgfx(352, absY, absX); txt4 = "An herblore skill cape."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7634) { //agility stillgfx(422, absY, absX); stillgfx(60, absY, absX); stillgfx(62, absY, absX); txt4 = "An agility skill cape."; stillgfx(185, absY, absX); stillgfx(186, absY, absX); txt4 = "A runecrafting skill cape."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } }
